Model

Class Deck

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Deck

  • public class Deck
extends java.lang.Object
    Class handling the gameDeck attribute of a master Game object. The instantiation of this class must always be preceded, even indirectly, by the instantiation of a Board object.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Deck(Board board)
      Constructor for a Deck object that, in itself, contructs multiple instances of the multiple subclasses of the Card class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void consolePrintActiveDeck()
      Console printing method that displays the contents of activeDeck on the environment console through consolePrintDeck().
      void consolePrintDiscardDeck()
      Console printing method that displays the contents of discardDeck on the environment console through consolePrintDeck().
      void discardCard(Card toDiscard)
      Equivalent setter method that adds a new Card object to the discardDeck.
      Card drawCard()
      Equivalent getter method that returns the Card instance that is at index 0 of activeDeck.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Deck

        public Deck(Board board)
        Constructor for a Deck object that, in itself, contructs multiple instances of the multiple subclasses of the Card class. Upon the last instantiation, the constructor will call the shuffle() method from the java.util class Collections.
        Parameters:
        board - Board object that will be the basis for the instantiation of CardGroup2 and CardGroup4 instances with SPEC_TYPE attributes of 1 and 2, respectively.
        See Also:
        Collections.shuffle(List), CardGroup2.findRandomProperty(Board), CardGroup4.findRandomProperty(Board)

    • Method Detail

      • drawCard

        public Card drawCard()
        Equivalent getter method that returns the Card instance that is at index 0 of activeDeck.

        Upon the removal of the top object in the ArrayList, if the activeDeck attribute is left empty, the replaceDeckAndShuffle() method is called.

        Returns:
        Card object that is taken from index 0 of the activeDeck attribute.
        See Also:
        replaceDeckAndShuffle()

      • discardCard

        public void discardCard(Card toDiscard)
        Equivalent setter method that adds a new Card object to the discardDeck.
        Parameters:
        toDiscard - Card instance that will be added to the discardDeck attribute.

      • consolePrintActiveDeck

        public void consolePrintActiveDeck()
        Console printing method that displays the contents of activeDeck on the environment console through consolePrintDeck(). Used only in program testing and confirmation.
        See Also:
        consolePrintDeck(ArrayList)

      • consolePrintDiscardDeck

        public void consolePrintDiscardDeck()
        Console printing method that displays the contents of discardDeck on the environment console through consolePrintDeck(). Used only in program testing and confirmation.
        See Also:
        consolePrintDeck(ArrayList)
